venue.name: Holyoke Community College, Kittredge Business Center, Rm. 205

item.description:
Monumental appeared in theatres on March 27th, 2012. If you missed the airing, or if you saw the movie and would like to experience it again, this event is for you! Space is limited, so please RSVP to Denise @ majormomdb1@aol.com. This event is free. Refreshments will be served.

Â Monumental is the story of America's beginnings. Follow Kirk Cameron as he travels across Europe and the United States as he meets with historians and experts in an effort to discover America's true National Treasure - the people, places, and principles that made America the freest, most prosperous, and generous nation the world has ever known.
item.name: see the movie MONUMENTAL, In Search of America's National Treasure
